document_data.title: The Cleric Quintet Omnibus
document_data.author: [[R.A. Salvatore]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''The Cleric Quintet''' is the other significant series by [[R.A. Salvatore]], after the extremely popular [[Legend of Drizzt]]. The entire series was reprinted in 2000. It is also available as a single collector's edition omnibus.

{{quote|''R.A. Salvatore's The Cleric Quintet tells the tale of the scholar-priest [[Cadderly Bonaduce|Cadderly]], plucked from the halls of the [[Edificant Library]] to fulfill a heroic quest across the land of [[Faer√ªn]].''}}

# ''[[Canticle]]'' (October 1991)
# ''[[In Sylvan Shadows]]'' (April 1992)
# ''[[Night Masks (novel)|Night Masks]]'' (August 1992)
# ''[[The Fallen Fortress]]'' (June 1993)
# ''[[The Chaos Curse]]'' (June 1994)
